solution_line_template: He paid a total of ${paid_two_months_ago} + ${paid_last_month} = $<<{paid_two_months_ago}+{paid_last_month}={total_paid_two_months}>>{total_paid_two_months} for two months.
Therefore, Jerry still has to pay ${total_debt} - ${total_paid_two_months} = $<<{total_debt}-{total_paid_two_months}={remaining_debt}>>{remaining_debt}.
